spots.name: Speedy Laundry
spots.description: Same-day laundry service! Drop off before 10am, pick up by 6pm. 40 THB per kg, wash and fold included. They also do dry cleaning for delicate items.
spots.address: Huay Kaew Road Soi 2, near Maya Mall

spots.name: AIS SIM Card Shop
spots.description: Get a Thai SIM card with unlimited data! Tourist package: 299 THB for 15 days unlimited 4G. Bring your passport. They speak English and can help set it up.
spots.address: Central Festival Chiang Mai, Ground Floor

spots.name: 7-Eleven ATM
spots.description: Nearest ATM that accepts international cards (Visa, Mastercard). Withdrawal fee is 220 THB. Max withdrawal 20,000 THB per transaction.
